attributes.action: intervene in this development to prevent the envirmental and noise pollution which will result from this ill judged scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With outline permission for a mixed business park, Solstice Park in Amesbury now want to build an RDC equivelant in size to Heathrow T5 this will be in only 55 acres of land and only 125 metres from a large residental area. These buildings will generate thousands of HGV and other traffic movements both day and night, creating untold noise and pollution locally. Permission has already been refused but they are now trying to take advantage of the new Wiltshire Unitary Council.  This development will be highly visible from the Stonehenge World Heritage Site, what a welcome to visitors from all over the world, especially with 2012 on the horizon.
